scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts an angel, identifiable by its wings, carrying a large cross. The angel is shown in profile, with curly hair and a flowing robe, leaning forward as if in motion. Its left hand is raised, pointing upwards, while its right hand supports the cross. Below the angel, there are depictions of faces, possibly representing souls or mourners. The background is filled with stylized clouds and floral motifs, suggesting a celestial or ethereal setting. The overall composition conveys a sense of divine mission and suffering.
